com.concordia.SOEN6461.MVC.model.calendar

Class AbstractCalendarModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.concordia.SOEN6461.MVC.model.calendar.AbstractCalendarModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalendarModel, IModel, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CachedCalendarModel, CalendarVector

    public abstract class AbstractCalendarModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
implements CalendarModel
    The abstract calendar model is a model that handles the basic functions for the calendar model.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
